titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the dollar and income limitations on the deduction for student loan interest.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Student Loan Interest Tax Deduction Expansion Act
This bill modifies the tax deduction for interest on qualified education loans to increase (1) the dollar limitation on the deduction to $7,500 ($15,000 in the case of a joint return), and (2) the limitation on modified adjusted gross income to $100,000 (twice the amount in the case of a joint return).
